name: Is It a Lie? 9-20
description:
This game is only a concept for the time being, I will add more content when I have added more story.

Hooray! This is my first game jam! I'm only a high school student that is just working on small projects in the meantime.

Please rate my game!! Helps me out a lot! :)

psst!! you should also check out my upcoming Android game Drive-By
